about.title: About Me
about.description: I am San Vert, a software engineer with a passion for creating efficient and user-friendly web applications. I have experience in developing scalable and maintainable web applications using modern technologies and frameworks. I am passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems.
